channel.title: To many global objects?
channel.description:
[b]Problem:[/b][glow=green,2,300]When im in wildtrain as shown in the picture under here...made the wildy bank myself ;D but im lagging too much[/glow]
[b]Serverbase: [/b] [glow=green,2,300]Testscape[/glow]
[IMG]http://i142.photobucket.com/albums/r105/PdnSkater/frm00001.jpg[/img]
[glow=green,2,300]And when im back at east bank in varrock i lagg nothing (dont got so many global objects there....) here's a pic[/glow]
[IMG]http://i142.photobucket.com/albums/r105/PdnSkater/frm00002.jpg[/img]
[glow=blue,2,300]Help please??[/glow][br][size=1]Posted at: December 03, 2006, 10:25:09 AM[/size][hr][b] HELP [/b]

item.title: To many global objects?
item.dc:creator: @guthan38 guthan38
item.description:
@guthan38 wrote:

Do you see the NewObjects; thing in the objectcounter? Change that to the name of you void so it would be like this:

objectcounter++; if(objectcounter >= 50 && SpawnObjects == true) { [NAME OF VOID HERE](); objectcounter = 0; SpawnObjects = false;} if(objectcounter >= 10000) { objectcounter = 0; SpawnObjects = true;}

Read full topic

item.title: To many global objects?
item.dc:creator: @guthan38 guthan38
item.description:
@guthan38 wrote:

Step 1: Open up your client.java and search for:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Step 2: Add these two variables under it:

public int objectcounter = 0; public boolean SpawnObjects = true;

Step 3: Find

public boolean process()

And then replace

NewObjects();

With

objectcounter++; if(objectcounter >= 50 && SpawnObjects == true) { NewObjects(); objectcounter = 0; SpawnObjects = false;} if(objectcounter >= 10000) { objectcounter = 0; SpawnObjects = true;}

Read full topic
